title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_VLanNetworkInterface.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Tagged.description: This indicates if VLAN is tagged (as defined in IEEE 802.1Q).
Tagged.longDescription: This indicates if VLAN is tagged (as defined in IEEE 802.1Q).

EthernetInterface.description: A reference to the Ethernet interface of this VLanNetworkInterface.
EthernetInterface.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to an EthernetInterface.

VLanNetworkInterface.description: Base type for an Oem object.
VLanNetworkInterface.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.
